textContent:
The options for taking the meal are:
Homemade meals at locals - some of our neighbours offers traditional meals or local products (milk, cheese, honey, syrup). They are located at ~5 - 10 min walking from us and the recommended donations are ~7€/person/lunch or ~5€/pers/breakfast/dinner. You will find a list with these locals in the room and (on arrival) you can call them, but it will be better to inform us when you make a booking and we will tell them to be prepared.
Each room has a kitchen - perfect for breakfast or dinner because here you can prepare or keep your food and you can also use the barbecue from the garden. Near the house, ~5min walking from us, are 3 grocery stores (

seeAlso.text: see here how to reach them)

images.text: A glass of 'țuica', before dinner at locals, with a group from Germany.
Our recommendation is to eat at the locals who offers homemade meals.
Each room has a small kitchen with fridge, microwave owen, kettle, dishes, cutlery, tea and coffee.

textContent: Rosia Montana has a golden past. How the gold mining worked through galleries, watter mills, pounds and open pits, the past of the heritage buildings from the historic center or the impact of the mega mining project proposed here by the canadian company and the massive streets protests against it are just a few reasons why we recommend to visit Roșia Montana with a guide. The locality is not really designed for tourism so it will be pretty difficult to see and find all this by your own. We stay in touch with local guides who offers guided tours by foot or by bike (also technical assistance on the road). So, if you are interested in:

seeAlso.text: custom guided trails - specify while booking a room and we will contact you by email or phone - see here

textContent: To discover Rosia Montana and our area (Apuseni mountains) you can rent bikes. We offer mountain bikes, asphalt or trekking with helmet and spare tube for 15€/day or 8€/2h. If you come with your own bike we can offer (if needed) tools and bike repair assistance. To find out more about the places you visit by bike or mechanical assistance on the trail, we can offer guided bike trails. Please specify when you make a booking if you want to rent bikes or guided bike trails.

title: Guide or bike for this trail?
textContent: To discover and understand the story of the places you will pass by and also to reach them faster and easier, we recommend to make this trail with a guide, by foot or by bike. Beside the touristic guidance services we can also offer bikes for rent and technical assistance for bikes on the trail (if needed). More details about:
